about-description: Test Bank helps you quickly create and customize quizzes, tests, and exams that fully align with your textbook or the Cambridge curriculum. Teachers can also track all the results of their students' work through the system.
features-description: Leveraging the power of technology for better learning and education
description-1: Questions and question types are provided following the Department of Education & Training curriculum and the Cambridge standard.
description-2: Teachers are able to use data gained through activities to track studentsâ€™ progress and adjust teaching style.
description-3: Tests can be created, modified and deleted easily with sets of questions divided by grade and skill level.
description-4: Teachers can assign tests to their students according to convenience and relevance.
